verbs.description: it a bird it a plane no it [ARGM-DIS: baby] [V: trump] twenty feet tall 13 feet wide orange with a flop of blond on top on sunday trump came to boston ahead of the midterms in the form of a giant diaper - clad inflatable infant with smartphone in hand it not how i would want to be portrayed myself said lauren piraino the organizer of an event that brought the trump baby balloon a satirical portrayal of president donald trump to boston for the first time but it would make me consider donald trump lauren piraino boston piraiano copley square coordinator new york united kingdom president
